item.title: Can i pay sponsor with credit card?
item.dc:creator: @Anfernio Anfernio
item.description:
@Anfernio wrote:

Honestly, you’re pretty desperate for players by the time you’re paying $300 for advertising.

item.title: Can i pay sponsor with credit card?
item.dc:creator: @software software
item.description:
@software wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:7, topic:317867”][quote author=software link=topic=414374.msg3053517#msg3053517 date=1260264999]

srt8 got back to you over PM with the answer. But I only accept payments from paypal, and you can use a credit card to pay through paypal, it’s all automatic.

O god… Maybe i just abuse my dad the paypal

Yes but its my dads credit card and my sis uses the paypal that the credit card is on, I like stole it from dad to pay the sponsor because he wont let me on paypal… Sigh :S
[/quote]

I’m not going to allow you to even bid if you are going to use a stolen credit card.

But for everyone else, you can pay with a credit card through paypal, I don’t see what the problem is.[/quote][br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 08, 2009, 12:19:31 pm[/size][hr]
[/quote]

I’m not going to allow you to even bid if you are going to use a stolen credit card.

But for everyone else, you can pay with a credit card through paypal, I don’t see what the problem is.
[/quote]

Sigh… Well my dad sayd i can pay it with paypal, But… He doesnt remember the paypal information, So we contacted paypal to remove the account and added credit card once again to paypal account, Now its pending it hopefully paypal accepts it before bidding ends, Ima bid like 300 or more Ima rich bitch. So just dont take the bidding away from me if i pay with paypal kkz?

Read full topic
item.source: Can i pay sponsor with credit card?

item.title: Can i pay sponsor with credit card?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“software, post:6, topic:317867”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=414374.msg3052770#msg3052770 date=1260212289]
srt8 got back to you over PM with the answer. But I only accept payments from paypal, and you can use a credit card to pay through paypal, it’s all automatic.
[/quote]

Yes but its my dads credit card and my sis uses the paypal that the credit card is on, I like stole it from dad to pay the sponsor because he wont let me on paypal… Sigh :S[/quote]

I’m not going to allow you to even bid if you are going to use a stolen credit card.

But for everyone else, you can pay with a credit card through paypal, I don’t see what the problem is.

Read full topic
